amendment.description: To provide for uniform standards and procedures for the interrogation of persons under the detention of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1566 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1566 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S8792-8793; text: CR S8792) To provide for uniform standards and procedures for the interrogation of persons under the detention of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1566 proposed by Senator Warner.
